content:
You're a true "Good Place" fan! Watching 2 episodes a day is impressive dedication! Season 3 is a great season, and I'm sure you're enjoying the twists and turns. The show's creators did an amazing job of balancing humor, philosophy, and character development.

As you continue watching, I'd love to hear your thoughts on the show's exploration of ethics, morality, and human nature. The Good Place raises so many interesting questions about what it means to be a good person, and how we can become better versions of ourselves.

Also, if you need any more TV show or documentary recommendations, feel free to ask! I'm always here to help. Have a fantastic day, and happy watching!
